title: Ginger Hotels, TajSATS to lead growth of Indian Hotelâ€™s new businesses
description: Indian Hotel Company (IHCL) plans to expand its new businesses, including Ginger Hotels and TajSATS, to 25% by the next few years. The value brand is expected to have a presence in all district headquarters. Other new businesses include food delivery business Qmin, business club Chambers, and cottage chain Ama Stays & Trails. TajSATS is expected to generate Rs 1,000 crore in FY25.
